doc.description: This example shows how opencv can be used on (for example) the Bebop drone. Important to know is that sw/ext/opencv_bebop must be downloaded, and made. After this is done the folder sw/ext/opencv_bebop/install has a opencv.xml file. The LDFLAGS in this file should be the same as in this conf file.

define.name: OBSERVER_FPS
define.description: The (maximum) frequency to run the calculations at. If zero, it will max out at the camera frame rate
